title: CLEAR Lab Book: A living manual of our values, guidelines, and protocols
description:
Civic Laboratory for Environmental Action Research (CLEAR) is a feminist, anti-colonial, marine science laboratory, which means our methods foreground values of humility, equity, and good land relations.
We’re working to do science differently.

The lab book guides our unique lab collective like scafolding for our specific feminist and anticolonial flavour. Our public lab book has been downloaded thousands of times (!!! wow--thank you!!!), and we hope that it is useful to you. That is our goal as a methods lab, after all!
